GAME INSTRUCTIONS

#########################################################

Keys:

Arrow Keys - Move

(only when you've won) R to reset

The game will flash at a pace depending on how far away you are from the target place. The closer you are, the faster it will flash.

Try to get on the spot where the game has instructed you to. The game will turn blue when you succeed.

MINIMAL SPECIFICATIONS

#########################################################

Minimal:

CPU:Potato

RAM: 20 MB, blame unity

GPU: Something that renders a pixel

SCREEN RESOLUTION: 1x1 pixels

AUDIO:N/A

(this is recommended to experience the game with full immersion)

Recommended:

CPU:i7 4770K or AMD FX-8350

RAM:32GB, but we'd appreciate if you'd get more.

GPU:2 GTX TITAN Z's

SCREEN RESOLUTION: 3840x2160 pixels

AUDIO:Something that runs iTunes or Google Music in the background. Get your own music!

DEVELOPERS NOTES
